rows.label: tlk70000080_02_msg0001
rows.name:
We don't know when the Holy
Grail will turn his gaze
toward the capital city.

rows.label: tlk70000080_02_msg0002
rows.name:
For the meantime, please rest
up and explore the city.

rows.label: tlk70000080_02_msg0003
rows.name:
There are always soldiers stationed
at Aquila Watchtower. They'll
spot the Holy Grail coming.

rows.label: tlk70000080_02_msg0004
rows.name:
If that happens, we'll
let you know right away.
